Class: Tree

PhyloCanvas. Tree

new Tree(div)

The instance of a PhyloCanvas Widget
Parameters:
Name Type Description
div string | HTMLDivElement the div or id of a div that phylocanvas will be drawn in PhyoCanvas.Tree
